ComicInfo.Title: The Grieving Proces, Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary: More of Eddie and Danielle's estranged past is revealed as her addiction to the drug begins to stress their relationship to the breaking point. Elsewhere Francis strikes out at those closest to the Hero in a horrorific attack of vengeance. Set in a world where the super heroes aren't really heroes at all...How far would you go to Fly?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-02 15:10:49. [CVDB370372]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Eric Johnson, Michael Garcia, Mike DeBalfo, Sanju Nivangune
ComicInfo.Editor: Hannah Gorfinkel Elder, Ralph Tedesco, Raven Gregory
ComicInfo.Characters: Danielle Patron, Eddie Patron, Francis Keiser, Mary Santinelle
